name: demo-glitch-deployment
description: This is a demo version of a website deployed to a Glitch server

scripts.deploy:gcf:googleapis: cd app\cloudFunctions\google && gcloud functions deploy googleapis --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account 13428009497-compute@developer.gserviceaccount.com && cd ..\..\..
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n "SERVER,WEBPACK,SCSS" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run start:w" "npm run build:w" "npm run watch:scss"

author: William Owen <william.owen.dev@gmail.com>
